steps.title: Welcome to Nexus
steps.body: Nexus is your all-in-one fundraising intelligence platform—built to help you manage clients, build campaigns, and measure what matters. Today, we'll walk through how to create a campaign from start to finish using a real-world example.

steps.title: Create Your Client
steps.body: Every campaign belongs to a client. Let's create a new one called Regional Food Bank—a community nonprofit that provides meals to families facing food insecurity.

steps.title: Start a New Campaign
steps.body: Each campaign lives inside its client workspace. Let's build an End-of-Year Holiday Campaign to raise $10,000 before December 31.

steps.title: Build the Campaign Plan
steps.body: Now let's define the details—messaging, segments, and creative assets. Campaigns in Nexus connect strategy, storytelling, and performance data in one view.
checklist: Add your campaign overview and key messages
Upload assets (holiday visuals, letters, social graphics)
Add audience segments (Current Donors, Lapsed Donors, Volunteers)
steps.tip: You can import ready-made Track15 templates to pre-fill messaging calendars and segment tags.

steps.title: Review Before Launch
steps.body: Before launching, review your campaign details. Check your assets, segments, and goal, then schedule your start date.
steps.tip: When you hit "Launch Campaign," Nexus will begin tracking data automatically—from donations to engagement metrics.

steps.title: Watch Your Results Grow
steps.body: Once your campaign is live, Nexus visualizes everything in real time. Track total raised, donor growth, channel performance, and milestones as your data syncs.
steps.tip: Each metric updates as new data comes in—no spreadsheets required.

steps.title: Create Campaign Reports
steps.body: Nexus automatically summarizes your campaign story in data form. Generate reports for clients, boards, or your own records.
options: Generate PDF Report – ready for sharing
Export CSV – for analytics deep dives
Schedule Automated Reports – send weekly summaries to your client
steps.tip: Reports highlight what worked, where to improve, and how to repeat success next year.

steps.title: Learn and Optimize
steps.body: Every completed campaign becomes part of your Nexus intelligence library. Compare results, duplicate top performers, and keep refining your strategy.
steps.tip: The End-of-Year Holiday Campaign raised 112% of goal—duplicate it next year with one click and start ahead.
